title: What is the role of music in your life? - Quora

response.answer_text: Music is like that significant part of my life that keeps me going. The ironic part is that it can make you forget everything or sometimes make you recollect every hurtful memory you've been put through. It's true that music requires to be well tuned and should have a ring to it, but in my case I can relate to the lyrics and that's what makes me a like a song the most regardless of how the tune is. If the lyrics are beautiful it's sufficient for me.

I am in a totally different world or life when i am with music: A life where everything is perfect.A life where all my dreams turns into reality.A life where i am a dancer and life a dance floor where i am accompanied by my love.After every stressful day i plug in my earphones and my favourite music on my phone ,a cool breeze in my hairs and I am all set for my living all stress behind and have a good night sleep.Whats better than having your favourite music pummping you up for a big workful day ahead.Instead of my husband , my music accompanies me in kitchen too ..In short , you can say Music is my best friend and it never leaves me alone.
